name: u-download
description: Fast, cross-platform YouTube downloader with GUI
author: Dedan Okware <softengde@gmail.com>

scripts.release:patch: npm run version:patch && V=$(node -p "require('./package.json').version") && git add . && git commit -m "chore: release v$V" && git tag -a v$V -m "Release v$V" && git push origin HEAD && git push origin v$V
scripts.release:minor: npm run version:minor && V=$(node -p "require('./package.json').version") && git add . && git commit -m "chore: release v$V" && git tag -a v$V -m "Release v$V" && git push origin HEAD && git push origin v$V
scripts.release:major: npm run version:major && V=$(node -p "require('./package.json').version") && git add . && git commit -m "chore: release v$V" && git tag -a v$V -m "Release v$V" && git push origin HEAD && git push origin v$V
